dmca.title: Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN!
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Joana [mailto:bobnorris@neo.rr.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, October 08, 2006 6:36 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN!
Subject: Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN!


Dear sir,
     
 
So that you will act to end copyright infringement of my work on your
member's website I am responding per item to your requirements as
directed by today's email from you.
 
This is the web site in question:  http://www.hsforum.net/
 
where it says this across every page on their site:  Joana's New Guide
<http://www.joanasworld.com/>  Is in the VIP Section
<http://www.hsforum.net/index.php?act=paysubs&CODE=index>  
 
I have checked it out and confirmed that it is indeed my copyrighted
work.  They are making users pay to see MY copyrighted work.
 
 
#1. My name is Paul M. Lucas.  That is my electronic signature for
immediate purposes.  A written signature will be additionally forwarded
by postal mail once I receive mailing instructions if need be.  I am the
owner of the work in question, which I copyrighted with the US Library
of Congress in February 2006.
 
#2.  The copyright protects my "Joana/Mancow's Leveling Guide For Horde"

 
#3.  This guide is text material detailing the routes and techniques I
employ to achieve world record time to move my character (Troll Hunter
for the Horde faction) from the start (level 1 in Durotar] to the end
[level 60 in Winterspring] in the popular online game World of Warcraft.
 
#4.   My Address:      Paul M. Lucas
                                P.O. Box 542
                                Barberton, Ohio 44203-4311
                                United States

          
 My Email:     BobNorris@neo.rr.com  or pml@neo.rr.com
 
#5.  I am complaining of the electronic distribution of my proprietary
work on your web server of which I did not give consent to or authorize
in any manner.  My work has been pirated and you are contributing to
this illegality by allowing it continue unabated.
 
#6.  I swear the foregoing statements are true and that I, Paul M.
Lucas, am the sole and proper owner of this now pirated guide. 
 

      I ask that you take immediate action to stop the illegal
distribution that you are now allowing of my copyrighted work.
 
      Sincerely, Paul M. Lucas.  Oct, 8, 2006
 

For more information:  Here is a copyright certificate scan:
http://www.joanasworld.com/joana_guide_copyright.jpg
 
And my homepage where I am selling it at:
http://www.joanasworld.com/
